text: Piri John Ngarangikaunuhia Sciascia (6 November 1946 – 18 January 2020) was a New Zealand Māori leader and university administrator. From 2016 until his death, he was kaumātua and advisor to the governor-general and government of New Zealand. He was a member of the organising committee for the international exhibition Te Maori. He died on 18 January 2020. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand educators Category:Officers of the New Zealand Order of Merit Category:New Zealand Māori people
title: Piri Sciascia
